survey_brief: This survey aims to assess the readiness of organizations to adopt digital transformation initiatives, identifying key challenges, opportunities, and employee preparedness.

questions.question_text: How would you rate your organization's current level of digital transformation maturity?
answer_options: Just beginning to explore digital transformation
Have some digital initiatives but lack a comprehensive strategy
Moderately advanced with several digital transformation projects
Highly mature with fully integrated digital processes
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity. Ensure options are mutually exclusive.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How would you rate your organization's current level of digital transformation maturity?
answer_options: Just beginning to explore digital transformation
Have some digital initiatives but lack a comprehensive strategy
Moderately advanced with several digital transformation projects
Highly mature with fully integrated digital processes

questions.question_text: Which of the following digital transformation initiatives has your organization implemented? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections but include an option for 'None of the above' to capture non-adopters.

script.question_text: Which of the following digital transformation initiatives has your organization implemented? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What are the biggest challenges your organization faces in implementing digital transformation?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice with an open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What are the biggest challenges your organization faces in implementing digital transformation?

questions.question_text: How well does your organization provide training and upskilling for employees to adapt to digital transformation?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How well does your organization provide training and upskilling for employees to adapt to digital transformation?

questions.question_text: What is the primary driver for digital transformation in your organization?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for unique drivers.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons with an open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is the primary driver for digital transformation in your organization?

questions.question_text: How would you describe the impact of digital transformation on your team's productivity?
questions.client_notes: Use a balanced scale with a 'Not applicable' option.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How would you describe the impact of digital transformation on your team's productivity?

questions.question_text: Which departments in your organization are most actively involved in digital transformation? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections with an 'Other' option for additional departments.
questions.scripter_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice with an open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which departments in your organization are most actively involved in digital transformation? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How would you rate the leadership's commitment to digital transformation in your organization?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How would you rate the leadership's commitment to digital transformation in your organization?

questions.question_text: What metrics does your organization use to measure the success of digital transformation initiatives?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for unique metrics.
questions.scripter_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice with an open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What metrics does your organization use to measure the success of digital transformation initiatives?

questions.question_text: What additional support or resources would help your organization accelerate digital transformation?
questions.client_notes: Allow for open-ended responses to capture diverse needs.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a text input field for open-ended responses.

script.question_text: What additional support or resources would help your organization accelerate digital transformation?
